author: James Joyce
text: Dear Larbaud: Will Mrs Nebbia and yourself dine with us and a small party at Langer’s, Champs Elysées, at 8 pm on Wednesday 2 February next? It is my birthday and the anniversary (5th) of publication of Ulysses and the international protest will be given to the press that day. Miss Beach, Mlle Monnier, the MacLeishes, Sisley Huddleston and two Irish friends of mine make the party. Please let me know by return as I have to reserve a table Kindest regards James Joyce
